  • clustalanalysis.run_clustal

Source code for clustalanalysis.run_clustal

import os
import subprocess

CLUSTAL_PATH = os.environ.get("CLUSTAL_PATH")



[docs]def cmd(command):
    process = subprocess.Popen(
        command,
        stdout=subprocess.PIPE,
        stderr=subprocess.PIPE,
        shell=True,
    )
    out, error = process.communicate()
    print(out, error)
    return out, error




[docs]def run_clustal(inputfile, outputfile):
    cmd_line = CLUSTAL_PATH + "clustalo -i " + inputfile + " --guidetree-out=" + outputfile + " --force"
    out, error = cmd(cmd_line)
    return out
